clean_data: Sr Surveillance Technician Sr Surveillance Technician IT Specialist Bullhead City AZ Decorated military veteran who earned multiple commendation for superior performance Extraordinary leader and problem solver with over 10 years as an experienced IT professional Detailoriented team player who is flexible reliable and adaptable to any environment Work Experience Sr Surveillance Technician Technical Systems Inc Garden Grove CA February 2015 to January 2017 Lead a team of 5 technicians for Wells Fargo of Californias Analog to PoE camera network and cabling conversion Designed CAD layouts for installation of new access control installations and PoE integration to include Camera locations and Point of View HID Card and FOB readers and Network HeadEnd equipment in accordance with Wells Fargo Corporate Security and Network Security installation guidelines Installed over 20 3VR Servers 15 Cisco PoE Network Switches and 250 PoE Cameras in 25 Wells Fargo Banking Centers both InStore Grocery and Retail Traditional Branches Maintained all Cisco PoE switches 3VR Servers and Cameras Analog and PoE for Wells Fargos Southern California Branches Orange County and San Diego Responsible for the inventory off all equipment to include Access Control Systems Surveillance Systems Cabling and Installation Equipment Senior Systems Administrator EJ Gallo Winery Modesto CA February 2013 to January 2015 Resolved computer hardware and software printing installation word processing email and operating systems issues Maintained 100 uptime on company networks through careful and preventative maintenance Resolved all virus and malware issues Installed maintained and configured servers network switches and operating Responsible for the accurate hardware and software inventories Systems Administrator Desktop Support Hill Family Corporation May 2010 to January 2013 Anaheim Hills CA Replaced POS machines trouble shooting Network outages replacing hardware and software Responsible for effective provisioning installationconfiguration operation and maintenance of systems hardware and software and related infrastructure Implemented company policies technical procedures and standards for preserving the integrity and security of data reports access and customer purchasing information per SOX regulations and guidelines Monitored network performance and provided network performance statistical reports for both realtime and historical measurements Desktop Support Specialist Morgan Drexen Anaheim CA December 2007 to March 2010 Provided a single point of contact for end users to receive support and maintenance within the organizations desktop computing environment Performed daily system monitoring verifying the integrity and availability of all hardware server resources systems and key processes reviewing system and application logs and verifying completion of scheduled jobs such as backups Created changed and deleted user accounts per request Engineered and implemented Solarwinds Network Administration Toolkit which established a real time network performance asset control hardware and software maintenance for all servers desktops network switches and integrated a built in trouble ticketing system Information Systems Technician E6 Naval Special Warfare Group One Mobile Communications Team US Navy Coronado CA October 2000 to September 2007 As a Mobile Communications Team LPO I led a team of highly trained communications specialists providing deployed Navy SEAL Teams with fullspectrum mobile communications and computer network services Responsibilities included the endtoend set up and maintenance of unclassified and secret computer networks to support mission planning and Tactical Operations Center TOC functions Access to the grid was achieved through portable VSAT satellite communications systems including the SDNMed SDNHeavy and Global Broadcast System GBS terminals Radio communications in the VHFUHFUHF SATCOMHF bands were achieved through a collection of manportable radios and field expedient antenna systems Education Associate of Science in Computer Information Systems Stanbridge College Irvine CA
